Name: oprnamespace
Description: the oid of the namespace that contains this operator

Name: oprkind
Description: b = infix operator ("both"), or l = prefix operator ("left")

Name: oprleft
Description: type of the left operand (zero for a prefix operator)

Name: oprresult
Description: type of the result (zero for a not-yet-defined "shell" operator)

Name: oprcom
Description: commutator of this operator (zero if none)

Name: oprnegate
Description: negator of this operator (zero if none)

Name: oprcode
Description: function that implements this operator (zero for a not-yet-defined "shell" operator)

Name: oprrest
Description: restriction selectivity estimation function for this operator (zero if none)

Name: oprjoin
Description: join selectivity estimation function for this operator (zero if none)
